info.title: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} Release Notes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This Release Notes documentation includes information on the list of changes between Rice ${previous.version} (released ${previous.reldate}) and Rice ${pom.version}. There are no database or impacting changes between Rice ${previous.version} and ${pom.version} and ${pom.version} should be a drop-in replacement.
If you encounter any difficulty, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact the Rice team on our public collaboration mailing list at rice.collab@kuali.org
Kuali Rice ${pom.version} can be downloaded from the Rice website at http://kuali.org/rice/download.
There are three differient distributions of Rice available: source, binary and server. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on each of these distributions.
Documentation for this release can be found at at http://kuali.org/rice/docs/${pom.version}.

sect2.title: Bug Fix
sect2.para: KULRICE-5249: Case Insensitive flag ignored in KNS
KULRICE-5314: KEN Notification's FYI / ACK buttons in detail view throw RuntimeException on click
KULRICE-5438: install-ant-jar and other maven related tasks in rice build.xml do not work with maven 3.0.x
KULRICE-5520: page's header menu bar has title/hover "Create a new record"
